contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 23, 1986 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest winners - Kirkintilloch. Hymn contest winners - Murray International Whitburn. Deportment winners - Scottish Brewers (Newtongrange).
9 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:36 p.m. Nov. 26, 2012, 6:37 p.m.
